abstract: After a months-long standoff, Microsoft has increased its offer, people involved in the talks said.
snippet: After a months-long standoff, Microsoft has increased its offer, people involved in the talks said.
lead_paragraph: After a months-long standoff, Microsoft and Yahoo are now engaged in active merger talks, people involved in the discussions said Friday.

headline.main: Microsoft and Yahoo Are Said to Step Up Talks

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Miguel Helft

abstract: Microsoft’s chief executive told employees that the company would announce in “short order” which of three paths it would choose in its pursuit of Yahoo.
snippet: Microsoft’s chief executive told employees that the company would announce in “short order” which of three paths it would choose in its pursuit of Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Ballmer, Microsoft’s chief executive, told employees on Thursday that the company would announce in “short order” which of three paths it would choose in its pursuit of Yahoo.

abstract: Steven A. Ballmer, Microsoft‘s chief executive, told employees on Thursday that the company would announce in “short order” which of three paths it would choose in its pursuit of Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Ballmer, Microsoft‘s chief executive, told employees on Thursday that the company would announce in “short order” which of three paths it would choose in its pursuit of Yahoo.

abstract: Steve Ballmer told employees he knows exactly what Yahoo is worth and won’t spend a dime more. In fact, Microsoft’s bet is so big, and uncertain, that Yahoo will likely be worth far more or far less than the $45 billion Microsoft is offering.
snippet: Steve Ballmer told employees he knows exactly what Yahoo is worth and won’t spend a dime more. In fact, Microsoft’s bet is so big, and uncertain, that Yahoo will likely be worth far more or far less than the $45 billion Microsoft is offering.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:00 p.m.: As merger talks between Microsoft and Yahoo got serious Friday, it was clear that Microsoft Chief Executive Steve Ballmer is going to haggle over every last dime.

headline.main: Steve Ballmer Wants to Hold On to His Dimes

abstract: After a months-long standoff, Microsoft and Yahoo are in active merger talks, a person involved in the discussions said.
lead_paragraph: After a months-long standoff, Microsoft and Yahoo are in active merger talks, a person involved in the discussions said.

headline.main: Finally, Microsoft and Yahoo in Merger Talks
